Lines.Speaker: Armorer
Lines.Text: I see you are back, faster than I expected. Are you in a hurry?

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: I got a special commission, something big. I need a better blaster, mine was damaged last time.

Lines.Speaker: Armorer
Lines.Text: Well, If it is for a bigger cause you can have this. *Gives an IB - 94 Blaster*.

Lines.Speaker: Armorer
Lines.Text: Tell me If you need anything else, If you have the way to afford It,  of course. The Mandalore vaults have to be supplied.
